content: /Tdaivame! Ninte krpa pole ennodu karuna cheyyaname; ninte karunayude bahuthvatthin prakaaram ente paapangall maayichukallayaname.
/tente anyaayatthil ninnu enne nannaayi kazhuki, ente paapangallil ninnu enne vedippaakkaname; entennaal ente athikramangall nyaan ariyunnu; ente paapangall eppozhum ente nereyumirikkunnu.

/tninnodu thanne nyaan paapam cheythu. Ninte thirumumpil thinmakall nyaan cheythu. Ennaal ninte vachanatthil nee neetheekarikkappedukayum, ninte nyaayavidhikallil nee jayikkukayum cheyyum. Entennaal anyaayatthil nyaan uthbhavichu; paapangallil ente maathaavu enne garbham dharikkukayum cheythu.

/tennaalu neethiyil nee ishdappettu. Ninte jnyaanatthinte rahasyangall enne nee ariyichu. Ninte soppaakondu ente mel thallikkaname. Nyaan vedippaakkappedum. Athinaal enne venmayaakkaname; urachamanyinekkaall nyaan venmayaakum.
/tninte aanandavum santoshavum kondu enne thrpthiyaakkaname. Ksheenamulllla ente asthhikall santoshikkum. Ente paapangallil ninnu ninte thirumukham thirich, ente athikramangall okkeyum maayikkaname.

/tdaivame! Vedippulllla hrdayam ennil srshdikkaname. Sthhirathayulllla aathmaavine ente ullllil puthuthaakkaname. Ninte thirumumpil ninnu enne thallllikkallayaruthe; ninte vishuddhaathmaavine ennil ninnu edukkayumaruthe.

/tennaalo ninte aanandavum rakshayum enikku thirichutharaname. Mahatthvamulllla ninte aathmaavu enne thaangumaaraakaname. Appoll nyaan athikramakkaare ninte vazhi padhippikkum. Paapikall ningkalekku thiriyukayum cheyyum.

/tente rakshayude daivamaaya daivame! Rakthatthil ninnu enne rakshichukollllaname. Ente naavu ninte neethiye sthuthikkum. Kartthaave! Ente adharangall enikku thurakkaname. Ente vaayu ninte sthuthikall paadum.
/tentennaal balikallil nee thirumanassaayilla; homabalikallil nee nirappaayathumilla. Daivatthinte bali thaazhmayulllla aathmaavaakunnu. Daivam nurungiya hrdayam nirasikkunnilla.

/tninte ishdatthaal sehiyonodu nanma cheyyaname. Oorshleminte mathilukall paniyaname. Appoll neethibalikallum homabalikallum nee ishdappedum. Appoll ninte balipeedhatthinmel kaallakall (baliyaayi) karerum.
